BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Replace `region` with `regionSupplier` in all AWS tests (#126285) Rather than hard-coding a region name we should always auto-generate it randomly during test execution. This commit replaces the remaining fixed `String` arguments with a `Supplier<String>` argument to enable this.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Mute org.elasticsearch.xpack.esql.qa.multi_node.EsqlSpecIT test {rerank.Reranker using multiple fields SYNC} #126320
